description: This file defines route handlers for decision-related API endpoints in an Express.js application. It includes CRUD operations (list, create, get, update, delete) with Swagger documentation annotations, middleware applications for authentication and validation, and references to decision controller functions.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list decisions with optional filtering and pagination.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new decision with provided details.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific decision by its UUID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing decision identified by UUID.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to soft-delete a decision by UUID.
